== Chengala (CT) (627134) ==

Chengala (CT) is a town in the [[Kasaragod]] taluka of [[Kasaragod]] district with an area of 9.07 sq. km. and harbouring 2791 households with total population of 15588 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kasaragod]] is at a distance of 10 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 630 km. Male population is 7698 and female population is 7890. Scheduled Caste population is 390 and Scheduled Tribes population is 27. Census Location Code of the town is 627134<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kanhangad  (m + og) at a distance of 30 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 165 km. Railway station is at Kasaragod at a distance of 10 km.
